pages.text: "A machine used to unify and translate between various items and blocks using the Ore Dictionary."$(p)The Oredictionificator can convert items/blocks into different items/blocks that have the same OreID.

For example, say you have 2 mods, Mod A and Mod B, that have steel ingots. You want to convert the steel ingots from Mod A into the steel ingots from Mod B. You can do that using some filters and the Oredictionificator.
